description: Accessible, customizable component library built with Radix UI and Tailwind CSS

Card.customization_notes: Use cn() utility from @/lib/utils for proper class merging
lessons_learned: Never use string concatenation for className - use cn() utility
cn() properly merges Tailwind classes using clsx + tailwind-merge
Custom classes passed via className prop will override defaults

Button.customization_notes: For custom backgrounds, use cn() or native <button> element
lessons_learned: Component's default styles can block custom styles without cn()
Use native <button> when complete style override needed
cn() utility ensures custom classes properly override defaults

cn.description: Merges Tailwind classes properly, resolving conflicts

best_practices: Always use cn() utility for className props in custom components
Install clsx and tailwind-merge as dependencies
Use exact Figma colors - never approximate
Full-width dividers: separate container from constrained content
Native HTML elements for complete style control when needed

lessons_from_conversions.lesson: Component library hardcoded defaults prevent custom styles
lessons_from_conversions.solution: Update all 7 components to use cn() utility
lessons_from_conversions.impact: Permanent fix - all future conversions benefit
